title: Week 1 position-by-position expert fantasy rankings: Start the season with a W
text:
It’s here, at long last — Week 1! It’s time for all the players that you’ve drafted to hit the field and do work!

Speaking of players doing work, after Patrick Mahomes set the league on fire last year, all eyes will be on how he follows up that raucous season.

Scroll to continue with content Ad

Yet, he’s not the consensus No. 1 quarterback in our Yahoo fantasy football experts’ rankings this week! Check them out below, and don’t forget to check every position available too!

2019 Fantasy Football Rankings powered by FantasyPros ECR ™ - Expert Consensus Rankings
description: Our experts reveal their fantasy football rankings for every position in time for Week 1 of the 2019 NFL season.
